places.title: Ostrava Zoo
places.description: A large and modern zoo featuring diverse animal species and beautiful botanical gardens.

places.title: Dolní Vítkovice
places.description: A former industrial site turned cultural and educational center, home to Bolt Tower and interactive exhibitions.

places.title: Štramberk Castle and Trúba Tower
places.description: Ruins of a medieval castle with a stunning cylindrical tower offering breathtaking views.

places.title: Pustevny and Radhošť
places.description: A famous mountain resort with scenic trails, wooden architecture, and the statue of Radegast.

places.title: Landek Park Mining Museum
places.description: The largest mining museum in Czechia, showcasing the history of coal mining with underground tours.

places.title: Hukvaldy Castle
places.description: A massive castle ruin offering panoramic views and the birthplace of composer Leoš Janáček.

places.title: Beskydy Mountains
places.description: A stunning natural area perfect for hiking, skiing, and enjoying the great outdoors.

places.title: Silesian Ostrava Castle
places.description: A well-preserved historic castle with exhibitions, cultural events, and a medieval atmosphere.

places.title: New City Hall Viewing Tower
places.description: Ostrava’s tallest tower providing panoramic views of the city and surrounding regions.

places.title: Opava Historic Center
places.description: A charming city center with historic buildings, beautiful squares, and cultural landmarks.

places.title: Hradec nad Moravicí Castle
places.description: A fairy-tale castle surrounded by beautiful parks and offering guided tours.

places.title: Muzeum Těšínska
places.description: A museum showcasing the history, culture, and traditions of the Těšín region.

places.title: Bílá Opava Waterfalls
places.description: A stunning series of waterfalls located along a scenic hiking trail in Jeseníky.

places.title: Technical Museum Tatra
places.description: A museum dedicated to the history of Tatra vehicles, featuring historic cars and trucks.

places.title: Čertova Lhotka
places.description: A picturesque rock formation in the Beskydy Mountains, known for its legend and hiking routes.

places.title: Kopřivnice Museum
places.description: A museum showcasing the industrial history and development of Kopřivnice and its famous Tatra brand.

places.title: Bílý Kříž
places.description: A scenic mountain area with beautiful landscapes, hiking trails, and a peaceful atmosphere.

places.title: Ostravice Dam
places.description: A picturesque dam with opportunities for swimming, fishing, and relaxing in nature.

places.title: Karviná Chateau Fryštát
places.description: A well-preserved chateau with elegant interiors and a historical park.
